member.name: T:Orleans.CodeGeneration.AssemblyResolver
member.summary: Simple class that loads the reference assemblies upon the AppDomain.AssemblyResolve

member.name: P:Orleans.CodeGeneration.AssemblyResolver.ReferenceAssemblyPaths
member.summary: Needs to be public so can be serialized accross the the app domain.

member.name: M:Orleans.CodeGeneration.AssemblyResolver.ResolveAssembly(System.Object,System.ResolveEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve event of an System.AppDomain
member.returns: The assembly that resolves the type, assembly, or resource; or null if theassembly cannot be resolved.

member.name: M:Orleans.CodeGeneration.Program.LogFormatter.PrintException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Utility function to convert an exception into printable format, including expanding and formatting any nested sub-expressions.
member.returns: Formatted string representation of the exception, including expanding and formatting any nested sub-expressions.
